readable.title: 405970010_8cebaa77d3
readable.content: A hiker on a snow-covered mountain overlooking a valley . A man carrying a backpack stands on a snowy area . A man in snow clothes and a red helmet is on top of a mountain with other mountains in the background . a man wearing a huge backpack and blue jacket with many distant mountains in the background A smiling hiker poses on top of a snow-covered mountain
